    1 Year Extended Warranty

    from Acko
    (27)
    • What's covered - Electrical and mechanical failures covered under the original manufacturer's warranty. What's not covered - Wear and tear and additional elements of an appliance apart from the main unit, are not a part of the cover.
    • Your plan details will be delivered via email and not shipped to you. It will come from Acko Technology & Services Private Limited within 7 days of purchase. Validity - Valid for 12 months after comphrensive manufacturer warranty has expired.
    • Acko Extended Warranty plans are only valid when purchased together with eligible new electronic products purchased on Amazon. No activation or app download required. The plan is not valid for any refurbished products or if purchased standalone.
    • Plan should be purchased along with Tablet and is valid only with new Tablet purchased on Amazon. Renewed/refurbished Tablet or plans purchased separately will not be covered. The Plan cannot be availed in case of return or refund of the Tablet with which the Plan was purchased.
    • Schedule a repair with just one click; No paperwork, no calls, no stress. Log on to Acko.tech to schedule a repair.
    Learn more

    1 Year Screen Damage Protection Plan

    from Zopper India
    (4)
    • Plan Details: Screen Damage Protection only covers any accidental and liquid damage to the screen of your Tablet, for a duration of 1 year from the purchase date of the device. There are no extra/hidden charges in the plan.
    • Plan Delivery: The plan is completely cashless, paperless and auto-activated with the policy delivered to you via e-mail. In case of an emergency, simply file your claim through the Amazon “Your Orders” section, and get your claim serviced by us.
    • Claim Process: Your plan details will be delivered via email. Check 'Buyer/Seller messages' under Message Center at amazon.in/msg or check your Amazon registered email ID. Confirmation mail will be sent from Amazon within 24 hours of ordering. Policy details will be sent from Zopper within 2 days of device shipment.
    • Your plan will only be valid when purchased together with eligible new products purchased on Amazon. At the time of claims - navigate to “Your Orders” section at amazon.in/your-orders, locate your device (Tablet) order and click on “Get Product Support”.
    • Any kind of mechanical and electrical breakdown not involving physical damage are excluded

      Replacement Instructions

      Purchase options and add-ons

      Brand Samsung
      Model Name Galaxy Tab S7 FE
      Memory Storage Capacity 128 GB
      Screen Size 31.5 Centimetres
      Display Resolution Maximum 2560 x 1600 (WQXGA) Pixels

      About this item

      • Display size - 31.5 cm (12.4 inch) Large Vibrant Display (2560 X 1600 WQXGA); Cinematic viewing experience in 16:10 screen-ratio; Display Type: TFT; Max Display brightness (500 nits); Screen refresh rate (60Hz)
      • Calling supported -Yes; 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Internal Memory (expandable to 1 TB); Processor Description - 2.2 GHz Powerful SDM750G processor for best-in class multi-media experience; Operating system - Android 11.0
      • Battery power - Enjoy upto 13 hrs of 720p Video Playback with 10,090 mAH battery; Camera Front - 5.0MP, Camera Back - 8MP, Camera Flash - No
      • Finger print sensor - No (2D Face recognition); GPS - Accelerometer, Compass, Gyro, Light, Hall sensor; Stylus compatible - S Pen in box; headphone jack - No; Dolby Atmos Speakers
      • S-Pen crafted for writing and drawing, Real-Pen like experience, no charging needed
      • 1 year manufacturer warranty for Tablet and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories; Included Components - Travel adaptor, Data Cable, Ejection Pin, QSG, S Pen

      How are ratings calculated?
      To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyses reviews to verify trustworthiness.
      View Image Gallery
      Amazon Customer
      3.0 out of 5 stars Good only if you get a very huge discount
      Reviewed in India on 8 June 2023
      I only bought it because i got it for 26k during some sale. If you are buying the 4GB variant for >30k that is a mistake.1. The display is very good, it isnt amoled and the viewing angles are bad, but when viewing from front its good.2. Speakers are louder and bassier than our smartphones but not very loud. Just enough that u wont complain.3. Size is big, i personally thought that would be good and i will watch many movies but since its also very heavy i dont use it as much as i thought i would, better go for 10.5 inch ones.4. S-pen works very nicely if you want that. I personally never use it.5. Battery is good, camera and microphone are just usable, just usable.6. Samsung ui and features are very nice but becomes unusable, will explain in conclusion.My conclusion:This tablet sucks big time, why ? Because even though it has 4gb ram it performs like it has 2gb. Seriously it feels like going back in time 10 years or using a 6-7k mobile.It is big, bulky but can only use 1 app at a time, or 2 browser tabs at a time. My current workflow/habit is of using atleast 10+ tabs on a mobile device.All these modern Android and processor features are useless if you can only use 1 app at a time. I feel disgusted everyday when i try switching app or a browser tab and it has to reload again.When scrolling on this 60hz slow tablet, every shopping app will feel slow, bloated and will hang.My brother bought a 10k samsung tablet at the same time, and apart from his average display, every other thing performs superb and is value for money.So only buy this if you want to only watch movie/series or read books etc and you are getting it for below 30k or take my advice and buy a tablet with atleast 6gb ram, no 4gb ram, no matter how good the reviews.
      Images in this review

      Top reviews from India

      There was a problem filtering reviews right now. Please try again later.

      Akash Sahu
      3.0 out of 5 stars Good only if you get a very huge discount
      Reviewed in India 🇮🇳 on 8 June 2023
      Colour: Mystic BlackSize: 4+64 GBStyle Name: WiFi OnlyVerified Purchase
      I only bought it because i got it for 26k during some sale. If you are buying the 4GB variant for >30k that is a mistake.

      1. The display is very good, it isnt amoled and the viewing angles are bad, but when viewing from front its good.
      2. Speakers are louder and bassier than our smartphones but not very loud. Just enough that u wont complain.
      3. Size is big, i personally thought that would be good and i will watch many movies but since its also very heavy i dont use it as much as i thought i would, better go for 10.5 inch ones.
      4. S-pen works very nicely if you want that. I personally never use it.
      5. Battery is good, camera and microphone are just usable, just usable.
      6. Samsung ui and features are very nice but becomes unusable, will explain in conclusion.

      My conclusion:
      This tablet sucks big time, why ? Because even though it has 4gb ram it performs like it has 2gb. Seriously it feels like going back in time 10 years or using a 6-7k mobile.
      It is big, bulky but can only use 1 app at a time, or 2 browser tabs at a time. My current workflow/habit is of using atleast 10+ tabs on a mobile device.
      All these modern Android and processor features are useless if you can only use 1 app at a time. I feel disgusted everyday when i try switching app or a browser tab and it has to reload again.
      When scrolling on this 60hz slow tablet, every shopping app will feel slow, bloated and will hang.
      My brother bought a 10k samsung tablet at the same time, and apart from his average display, every other thing performs superb and is value for money.
      So only buy this if you want to only watch movie/series or read books etc and you are getting it for below 30k or take my advice and buy a tablet with atleast 6gb ram, no 4gb ram, no matter how good the reviews.
      Read more
      Akash Sahu
      3.0 out of 5 stars Good only if you get a very huge discount
      Reviewed in India 🇮🇳 on 8 June 2023
      I only bought it because i got it for 26k during some sale. If you are buying the 4GB variant for >30k that is a mistake.

      1. The display is very good, it isnt amoled and the viewing angles are bad, but when viewing from front its good.
      2. Speakers are louder and bassier than our smartphones but not very loud. Just enough that u wont complain.
      3. Size is big, i personally thought that would be good and i will watch many movies but since its also very heavy i dont use it as much as i thought i would, better go for 10.5 inch ones.
      4. S-pen works very nicely if you want that. I personally never use it.
      5. Battery is good, camera and microphone are just usable, just usable.
      6. Samsung ui and features are very nice but becomes unusable, will explain in conclusion.

      My conclusion:
      This tablet sucks big time, why ? Because even though it has 4gb ram it performs like it has 2gb. Seriously it feels like going back in time 10 years or using a 6-7k mobile.
      It is big, bulky but can only use 1 app at a time, or 2 browser tabs at a time. My current workflow/habit is of using atleast 10+ tabs on a mobile device.
      All these modern Android and processor features are useless if you can only use 1 app at a time. I feel disgusted everyday when i try switching app or a browser tab and it has to reload again.
      When scrolling on this 60hz slow tablet, every shopping app will feel slow, bloated and will hang.
      My brother bought a 10k samsung tablet at the same time, and apart from his average display, every other thing performs superb and is value for money.
      So only buy this if you want to only watch movie/series or read books etc and you are getting it for below 30k or take my advice and buy a tablet with atleast 6gb ram, no 4gb ram, no matter how good the reviews.

      😊
      5.0 out of 5 stars Very useful for online studies
      Reviewed in India 🇮🇳 on 30 May 2023
      Colour: Mystic PinkSize: 4+64 GBStyle Name: WiFi OnlyVerified Purchase
      Writing the review after 7months of using the tab and it's absolutely incredible. It's a true lifesaver for students who are studying via online resources. The split screen feature is quite helpful for multitasking and it works perfectly due to the 12.4 inches large screen. The s-pen is just a cherry on top. The battery back up and sound quality is impressive too. Overall it's a big fat "yes" from me :):)

       Report
      Mayank Shukla
      3.0 out of 5 stars Decent tablet, but below average performance.
      Reviewed in India 🇮🇳 on 29 April 2023
      Colour: Mystic SilverSize: 4+64 GBStyle Name: WiFi OnlyVerified Purchase
      Been using it for more than 15 months now and have mixed feeling about it.
      The display is very good, the note taking is fluent but the tablet is painfully slow!! And not that it has started happening after a year, nope, it was slow from the first month.
      The samsung notes app is very efficient and u will have no problems untill you are just using the notes app and taking notes. Just when you think of opening 2 apps together in a split screen (like an education app along with notes), it becomes a headache beacuse the ram management is TERRIBLE on device, as it is doesn't even feel like 4GB. Even a single app won't work properly in the background without reloading when you switch back to it.

      Battery is humoungous. Connectivity is good. Audio is very good too. Overall given the performance, the device ain't value for money.
      So, if you are trying to buy a tab JUST for taking notes, and do not care about the other benefits that android offers(like third party apps and mods), consider going for ipad 9th gen + pencil (which will cost you the same). I could have switched to ipad aswell, but i love my samsung phone and buds 2 and wanted to be in the samsung ecosystem.
      Think about your exact needs before buying any Tablet.
      Read more

      Been using it for more than 15 months now and have mixed feeling about it.
      The display is very good, the note taking is fluent but the tablet is painfully slow!! And not that it has started happening after a year, nope, it was slow from the first month.
      The samsung notes app is very efficient and u will have no problems untill you are just using the notes app and taking notes. Just when you think of opening 2 apps together in a split screen (like an education app along with notes), it becomes a headache beacuse the ram management is TERRIBLE on device, as it is doesn't even feel like 4GB. Even a single app won't work properly in the background without reloading when you switch back to it.

      Battery is humoungous. Connectivity is good. Audio is very good too. Overall given the performance, the device ain't value for money.
      So, if you are trying to buy a tab JUST for taking notes, and do not care about the other benefits that android offers(like third party apps and mods), consider going for ipad 9th gen + pencil (which will cost you the same). I could have switched to ipad aswell, but i love my samsung phone and buds 2 and wanted to be in the samsung ecosystem.
      Think about your exact needs before buying any Tablet.

      4.0 out of 5 stars Great Amazon customer service and user friendly product
      Reviewed in India 🇮🇳 on 8 March 2023
      Colour: Mystic BlackSize: 4+64 GBStyle Name: WiFi OnlyVerified Purchase
      Initially received a defective product but replaced by a good one. Amazon service was excellent and delivered before time. Only problem was with technical expert, who can verify the product (if defective) and allow for replacement. 3 times requested but they didn't come, finally amazon customer care helped me and by reviewing images of product confirm replacement.
      Great customer care team and their friendly approach. You can buy tension free.
      Regarding S7 no comments, as per me one of best user friendly tablet targeting student section. Must buy.
